overview: Betty (August Arroya) was the wildest girl at the Police Academy, ready to take on anything - or anyone. So along with her diploma, she earned quite the reputation, and a nickname to go with it: Betty Danger. Her friends always said she'd either become a Vice Detective, or get picked up by one, so when she received her promotion to join the Vice Squad, she knew she found her true calling.
title: Betty Danger: Vice Cop
